property.name: Everything & More at River Front 95! Dock, Bar
property.location_name: Everything & More at River Front 95! Dock, Bar
property.short_description:
Everything & More at River Front 95! Dock, Bar
Let the good times roll at River Front 95! A vacation rental like no other on the Parker Strip! 4 beautiful bedrooms, pullout couch and 2 bathrooms in the main house. An additional (super cool!) bathroom and plenty of comfy couches in the detached game room and bar. Outdoor deck, fenced yard, beach bar, launch ramp. The best of everything! This is the perfect spot for any special occasion!
property.condo_type_name: Layla Wade Everything & More at River Front 95! Dock, Bar

property.name: Gorgeous Hacienda on the River! Private dock!
property.location_name: Gorgeous Hacienda on the River! Private dock!
property.short_description:
Gorgeous Hacienda on the River! Private dock!
One of the most beautiful homes on the Parker Strip is now a vacation home! It doesn't get any better than this! Fully refreshed with no detail overlooked! Top of the line everything including a gourmet kitchen, a fully stocked beverage center, a new dock and balconies abound! Two story, 4 bedroom, 3 bathrooms, gourmet kitchen, bar, gameroom, fireplace, private dock and launch ramp.  Total resort style home with no detail overlooked. Perfect for the whole family and all the friends. In addition to the main house there are 2 apartments underneath for even more room. (only for use with main house rental)  Everything you need to make the most memorable river trip yet!
This is the one you want!
property.condo_type_name: Layla Wade Gorgeous Hacienda on the River! Private dock!

property.name: 48' Boat Garage! Pool, Game Room, Bar, Private
property.location_name: 48' Boat Garage! Pool, Game Room, Bar, Private
property.short_description:
City of Lake Havasu-STR Permit #017298
AZ Dept of Revenue-TPT License #21374817

Lovely pet friendly, family retreat, well stocked, roomy home, with 3 refrigerators and 2 microwaves. Home and patios wired with "super string" for superior wifi signals throughout. 55" Roku Smart TVs in Master Suite, Great Room, and Game Room. Dedicated workspace with large desk for keeping up at work. Many ways to entertain your group from the foosball, pool table, professional electronic dartboard for 4 players, and nice selection of board games. Private pool to take in the lake view or from the roof top viewing deck. . . those Havasu sunsets will take your breath away! Propane charges to heat the pool are an additional cost at the current market rate. Pets are welcome with an additional $200/pet non-refundable fee. Call Sales Agent, and Vacation Rental Specialist Tanya Brown at 928-733-0600 for more information. 5 bedroom/4 bath-(1) full bath, (3) 3/4 bath, (2) Master suites both with king beds, queen beds in guest rooms #1 and #2, Bunk Room offers 2 sets of bunks with twins on top/full beds on bottom. BASE RATE IS FOR 10 GUESTS, ABOVE 10 ADD $20/DAY/PERSON. RESPONSIBLE FOR ALL PROPANE CHARGES TO HEAT POOL (see rental agreement page 2)
Stays longer than 30 days are subject to electric and/or gas charges. group getaway?? This .46 acre property sleeps 14 with lots of room for ALL your toys and AC. Built-in BBQ, Pebble Tec heated pool, game room, secured/shaded dog run, rooftop deck, Straight shot to Havasu State Park Windsor launch ramp.
property.condo_type_name: Tanya Brown 48' Boat Garage! Pool, Game Room, Bar, Private

property.name: Luxe Havasu 6-bedroom Retreat! Pool, Hot tub, Lake Views!
property.location_name: Luxe Havasu 6-bedroom Retreat! Pool, Hot tub, Lake Views!
property.short_description:
This luxurious vacation rental in Lake Havasu City is the epitome of resort-style living. With 6 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, this beautifully decorated home offers plenty of space for families or groups of friends to relax and unwind. Step out into the back yard and you'll find a stunning oasis complete with a heated pool, hot tub, and a putting green – perfect for enjoying the beautiful Arizona weather. The large RV garage and ample parking make it easy to bring along all your toys for a fun-filled vacation.
Not only does this rental offer top-notch amenities, but it also boasts breathtaking views of Lake Havasu. Whether you're lounging by the pool or enjoying a meal on the outdoor patio, you'll be surrounded by stunning scenery. With 5-star accommodations and unbeatable location, this vacation rental is sure to provide an unforgettable getaway for you and your loved ones.

City Registration #032498
property.condo_type_name: Layla Wade Luxe Havasu 6-bedroom Retreat! Pool, Hot tub, Lake Views!

property.name: Alibi-Step to open desert
property.location_name: Alibi-Step to open desert
property.short_description:
30 DAY MINIMUM ONLY - ELECTRIC & NATURAL GAS CHARGES MAY APPLY

Nestled next to our beautiful open desert this large 3 bed 3 bath pool & spa home delivers on location, spaciousness and Beautiful lake view
sunsets. 2 1/2 garage spaces available for your use. Cable TV and WIFI Internet are also available. Pet friendly upon approval

Lake Havasu offers some of the best cruising in the southwestern U.S., centrally located along 60 continuous miles of lake and river waterways from where the Colorado River meets 
Parker Dam all the way to Needles, Calif. More than 400 miles of stunning coastline offer exceptional water-sports, including fishing, skiing, kayaking and house boating, 
or you can explore the lake from the beautiful beaches, campsites and hiking trails. Stays longer than 30 days are subject to electric and/or gas charges.

Come, stay and play at Alibi

Until confirmed, prices & availability are subject to change.  AZ tax is applied to all rentals 29 days or less
property.condo_type_name: Patti Mentch Alibi-Step to open desert

property.name: Lodestar Lake Livin! 4-bedroom, pool, VIEWS!
property.location_name: Lodestar Lake Livin! 4-bedroom, pool, VIEWS!
property.short_description:
This stunning 4- bedroom 3 bath vacation rental is the perfect family getaway in Lake Havasu City. Featuring breathtaking lake and mountain views, this rental is sure to impress. The spacious living area is perfect for quality time with loved ones and is equipped with all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. Enjoy a refreshing dip in the refreshing pool, or simply relax on the expansive patio and take in the incredible views. The rental boasts plenty of parking space for your convenience. Additionally, the home is equipped with a variety of games for your entertainment and enjoyment. With its ideal location and endless amenities, this rental is the perfect place to unwind and create unforgettable memories with your loved ones.

4-bedrooms. King, queens and bunk-beds. Easy access to the desert and the lake! About 4 miles to the World-Famous London Bridge! Plenty of room for everyone! Don't miss this one!  Book your stay today!
property.condo_type_name: Layla Wade Lodestar Lake Livin! 4-bedroom, pool, VIEWS!

property.name: All-American Escape, Riverfront! WB3
property.location_name: All-American Escape, Riverfront! WB3
property.short_description:
Welcome to your perfect riverfront vacation rental on the Parker Strip! Brand new unit with brand new ice cold AC! This patriotic theme, tiny house is the perfect getaway for a family or small group of friends who are looking to relax and have some fun in the sun. The house features a comfortable queen bedroom, a bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and a cozy living area where you can kick back and relax. The upstairs loft has two additional queen beds. Adjacent to the tiny house is a beautiful casita, featuring a queen bed, bathroom, and mini kitchen.

Step outside and enjoy your private patio area, complete with outdoor furniture and a BBQ grill, where you can cook up a feast with your family and friends. , perfect for additional guests or relatives visiting from out of town.

Located in the River Lodge Resort on the California side of the Colorado River, you will have access to 2 boat launches and buoys to tie up your own boat. Rent a lily pad or kayak to explore the river and surrounding areas at your leisure. Stays longer than 30 days are subject to electric and/or gas charges.
property.condo_type_name: Layla Wade All-American Escape, Riverfront! WB3

property.name: South Side Beauty! Heated pool, RV Garage
property.location_name: South Side Beauty! Heated pool, RV Garage
property.short_description:
Spend your next getaway in this modern vacation rental in Lake Havasu City! This stunning property features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, offering plenty of space for you and your guests to relax and unwind. The home is clean, comfortable, and beautifully decorated, making you feel right at home from the moment you arrive.
Step outside into the backyard and discover your own private oasis. Take a dip in the sparkling heated pool, soak in the hot tub, or simply lounge on the patio and take in the breathtaking lake views. With a large RV garage and plenty of parking, this rental is perfect for those traveling with vehicles or looking to explore the area with ease.
This vacation rental truly has it all - from the luxurious amenities to the stunning surroundings, it's guaranteed to make your stay in Lake Havasu City unforgettable.

TPT #2156540
